sentences.sentence: There were many buffaloes in North America 100 years ago.
Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebras, bison, water buffaloes, ostriches, and antelopes.
sentences.translation: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

sentences.sentence: He also disposes of dead buffaloes, cattle and goats.
sentences.translation: 他的第二份工作则负责处理一些死去的水牛，牛以及山羊。
